com.stoyanr.mastermind

Class Distribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stoyanr.mastermind.Distribution

  • public class Distribution
extends Object
    A distribution, or data set, of integer values. Provides methods for adding numbers and calculating various parameters, such as mean, standard deviation, and n-th percentile.
    Author:
    Stoyan Rachev
